title: Tarteel AI
description: Get live feedback on your Quran recitation using AI

title: Niyyah
description: Understand and apply the Quran with quizzes personalised using AI

title: IslamChat
description: RAG over a database of more than 140,000 Islamic rulings (fatawa) to answer users' questions

title: Mufti.ai
description: RAG over transcripts of 3,689 Mufti Menk videos to answer users' questions

title: Hadith GPT
description: RAG over the repositories of Hadith to find related information

title: Ansari
description: Islamic digital assistant that uses multiple tools to answer people's questions or to generate text

title: Hadith.is
description: RAG over 33,850 hadiths using GPT-3. Answers backed by actual hadiths referenced.

title: AraNizer
description: Tokenizer for Arabic that is much more efficient (on average, large providers like OpenAI encode 1 Arabic word with 8 tokens vs 1.3 tokens for English

title: ArabianGPT
description: Native Arabic GPT-based Large Language Model

title: BATIK
description: Broad Automated Test of Islamic Knowledge - 100 multiple choice questions designed to ensure that a chatbot gets the basics of Islam right
